LanguageData.VFED_ImperialDefenses.label: imperial defenses
LanguageData.VFED_ImperialDefenses.description: Create imperial megaturrets: Kontarion, Onager and Palintone, as well as their ammunition.
LanguageData.VFED_ImperialWarSolutions.label: imperial war solutions
LanguageData.VFED_ImperialWarSolutions.description: Craft powerful imperial mortar shells, such as shrapnel, armor piercing and cluster.
LanguageData.VFED_RemoteDemolition.label: imperial war solutions
LanguageData.VFED_RemoteDemolition.description: Build advanced explosive traps with remote detonation mechanism.
